entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
